author: rovere
body:
- Added new tools to easily compare the Material map between MC and reconstruction.
- Locally store an improved version of the reconstruction material description, but do not propagate it to "production". It will very likely be bundled with the next round of material description for PhaseI after the PhaseI geometry will be finalised.
- Extensive documentation on how to run and use the tool has been included.
title: Reco material tools
